comlibdoc.instructions: Case 1: If shortdesc is empty, use content from summary as content for shortdesc Case 2: summary can have @shortdesc which indicates replacing @shortdesc with content from shortdesc element - Need check to prevent cyclic refs. Case 3: fileref is used designate that the summary text should be applied to the summary element for the class in that file. this is used to have a single location for component documentation at a high-level and auto-apply to components. Case 4: example component is used for codeplex wiki purposes. wikienabled= true | false : true = included for processing in codeplexdocgenerator tool wikistyle= xml_markers | full_file | file_ref: xml_markers: process the doc: tags in the file full_file: include the full file for the wiki not_available: use text that says "not available" please refer to example.

component.name: Aggregate
component.shortdesc: Provides sum, min, max, avg, count aggregate functions for lists.

component.name: Alias
component.shortdesc: Provides using an alias for a keyword such as set for var inside a script.

component.name: AndOr
component.shortdesc: Provides words "and" "or" to be used in place of && and ||

component.name: Bool
component.shortdesc: Provides synonyms yes/no, on/off for bool values true/false.

component.name: Compare
component.shortdesc: Provides synonyms for comparison operators

component.name: ConstCaps
component.shortdesc: Allows defining constants with UPPERCASE letters.

component.name: Date
component.shortdesc: Provides word based representation for dates e.g December 21st 2011

component.name: DateNumber
component.shortdesc: Provides representation of dates in the form of numbers e.g. 1/27/2012

component.name: Day
component.shortdesc: Provides alias and word based representation for days e.g Tuesday, Saturday, today, tommorrow

component.name: Def
component.shortdesc: Allows the word "def" to be used instead of "function" when declaring functions.

component.name: Email
component.shortdesc: Provides using emails without quotes such as john.doe@company.com

component.name: Env
component.shortdesc: Provides access to environment variables

component.name: Fail
component.shortdesc: Terminates a program abruptly with a message.

component.name: FileExt
component.shortdesc: Allows represnting file extension with out having to surround them in quotes e.g. .xml, .doc, *.dll

component.name: FileIO
component.shortdesc: Provides basic File/Directory operations.

component.name: Fluent Functions
component.shortdesc: Provides ability to call functions with spaces in name. e.g. refill inventory
component.summary: @shortdesc. If a function is defined with name "refill_inventory", it can be called using "refill inventory". The plugin will attemp to find a matching function name by first replacing the spaces with underscores "_". There can be at most 4 consequtive words between spaces representing the function name. Parenthesis are also optional, however if the parenthesis are not present, the function call must end on a single line e.g. via ; or newline.

component.name: Fluent Members
component.shortdesc: Provides ability to access properties and methods on a custom c# object without the "."( dot operator ).

component.name: Function Wildcard
component.shortdesc: Provides a 'wildcard' like ability to functions so that 2 functions that have different names are associated with the same function.

component.name: HashComment
component.shortdesc: Provides single line comment using # instead of //

component.name: Holiday
component.shortdesc: Provides holiday names e.g. Christmas, Independence Day, Christmas Eve, New Years

component.name: Linq
component.shortdesc: Provides partial support for linq-like queries on lists.

component.name: Log
component.shortdesc: Provides logging ability to either the console or a log file

component.name: MachineInfo
component.shortdesc: Provides markers/comments that are checked for syntax

component.name: Marker
component.shortdesc: Provides markers/comments that are checked for syntax

component.name: Money
component.shortdesc: Provides dollar sign $ support for numbers.

component.name: Percent
component.shortdesc: Provides using a percent sign % after a number to indicate percentage

component.name: Print
component.shortdesc: Provides functionality to print to console a line of text without wrapping around quotes.

component.name: Records
component.shortdesc: Supports representing data in a table/csv like format.

component.name: Repeat
component.shortdesc: Repeat plugin provides convenient ways to execute loops.

component.name: Round
component.shortdesc: Provides rounding of numbers using round, round up, round down.

component.name: Run
component.shortdesc: Provides alternative ways of calling a function.

component.name: Set
component.shortdesc: Allows the word "set" to be used instead of "var" when declaring variables

component.name: Sort
component.shortdesc: Provides ability to sort of list of either basic types of objects with properties.

component.name: Step
component.shortdesc: Allows the word "step" to be used instead of "function" when declaring functions.

component.name: Suffix
component.shortdesc: Provides enables the use of functions as postfix operators on constants

component.name: Swap
component.shortdesc: Provides ability to swap values of 2 variables in 1 statement e.g swap a with b;

component.name: Time
component.shortdesc: Provides time representation in format 12:30 pm

component.name: TypeOf
component.shortdesc: Provides checking of data types

component.name: Units
component.shortdesc: Provides usage of units of measure such as length, weight

component.name: Uri
component.shortdesc: Provides url and folder representations as strings without quotes.

component.name: VariablePath
component.shortdesc: Provides representation of file paths in more convenient ways.

component.name: Version
component.shortdesc: Version plugin enables representation of versions using format 1.2.3.4.

component.name: Words
component.shortdesc: Provides ability to use multi-word strings. e.g fluent script = 'fluent script'
